name: E2E Test

on:
  push:
  pull_request:
    - master

jobs:
  cypress_tests:
    name: Run Cypress Tests
    runs-on: ubuntu_latest
    steps:
      - name: Check out repository
        uses: actions/checkout@v2

      - name: Install dependencies in webApp
        run: npm install
        working-directory: ./ChumsApp
